title: 46: Switched to using JPEGs instead of PNGs
message:
46: Switched to using JPEGs instead of PNGs

Also, added pre-cropped/resized drawables for the picker display

There are two reasons for switching to JPEGs for the base format:

- Filesize.  Some clients had problems with larger PNGs.

- Format.  Some clients had problems with PNGs.

As for the pre-cropped/resized drawables, that was for performance.
Now the GridView should be silky smooth due to fewer GCs and less
data loading constantly.

title: Back up PNG source files

Back up PNG source files

the PNGs somewhere.
